channel.title: Big-Tech on Erik Ace
channel.description: Recent content in Big-Tech on Erik Ace

item.title: The Tech Industry has Lost the Plot
item.description: For myself, some of my coworkers, and engineers I meet with outside of work - there has been an overwhelming sense of: ‘AI is cool, but why is it being put into every product?’ A similar sentiment came to pass during the crypto boom and collapse, it was everywhere, but how useful was it to us? With the increase of interest rates the tech industry has been unable to garner the attention of investors this causes two crises for the tech industry:
